   16: -module(metrics_api_SUITE).
   17: -compile(export_all).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   20: 
   21: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   22:     [ct:fail("assert_equal(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n",
   23:              [(??E), (??V), (E), (V)])
   24:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   25:     )).
   26: 
   27: -define(assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   28:     [ct:fail("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   29:              [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   30:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   31:     )).
   32: 
   33: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: %% Suite configuration
   35: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   36: all() ->
   37:     [{group, metrics},
   38:      {group, stories},
   39:      {group, global}
   40:     ].
   41: 
   42: groups() ->
   43:     [{metrics, [], [message_flow]},
   44:      {stories, [], [one_client_just_logs_in,
   45:                     two_clients_just_log_in,
   46:                     one_message_sent,
   47:                     one_direct_presence_sent,
   48:                     one_iq_sent,
   49:                     one_message_error,
   50:                     one_iq_error,
   51:                     one_presence_error
   52:                    ]},
   53:      {global, [], [session_counters,
   54:                    node_uptime]}
   55:     ].
   56: 
   57: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   58:     Config1 = dynamic_modules:stop_running(mod_offline, Config),
   59:     Config2 = escalus:init_per_suite(Config1),
   60:     katt_helper:init_per_suite(Config2).
   61: 
   62: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     katt_helper:end_per_suite(Config),
   64:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config),
   65:     dynamic_modules:start_running(Config).
   66: 
   67: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   68:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   69: 
   70: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   71:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   72: 
   73: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   74:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   75: 
   76: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   77:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   78: 
   79: 
   80: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   81: %% metrics_api tests
   82: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   83: message_flow(Config) ->
   84:     katt_helper:run(metrics, Config).
   85: 
   86: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   87: %% metric update tests
   88: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   89: 
   90: one_client_just_logs_in(Config) ->
   91:     instrumented_story
   92:         (Config, [{alice, 1}],
   93:          fun(_Alice) -> end_of_story end,
   94:          %% A list of metrics and their expected relative increase
   95:          [{xmppIqSent, 0},
   96:           {xmppIqReceived, 0},
   97:           {xmppMessageSent, 0},
   98:           {xmppMessageReceived, 0},
   99:           {xmppPresenceSent, 0 + user_alpha(1)},
  100:           {xmppPresenceReceived, 0 + user_alpha(1)},
  101:           {xmppStanzaSent, 0 + user_alpha(1)},
  102:           {xmppStanzaReceived, 0 + user_alpha(1)},
  103:           {sessionSuccessfulLogins, 0 + user_alpha(1)},
  104:           {sessionLogouts, 0 + user_alpha(1)}
  105:          ]).
  106: 
  107: two_clients_just_log_in(Config) ->
  108:     instrumented_story
  109:         (Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  110:          fun(_Alice, _Bob) -> end_of_story end,
  111:          [{xmppMessageSent, 0},
  112:           {xmppMessageReceived, 0},
  113:           {xmppStanzaSent, 0 + user_alpha(2)},
  114:           {xmppStanzaReceived, 0 + user_alpha(2)},
  115:           {xmppPresenceSent, 0 + user_alpha(2)},
  116:           {xmppPresenceReceived, 0 + user_alpha(2)},
  117:           {sessionSuccessfulLogins, 0 + user_alpha(2)},
  118:           {sessionLogouts, 0 + user_alpha(2)}
  119:          ]).
  120: 
  121: one_message_sent(Config) ->
  122:     instrumented_story
  123:       (Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  124:        fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  125:                Chat = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>),
  126:                escalus_client:send(Alice, Chat),
  127:                escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)
  128:        end,
  129:        [{xmppMessageSent,     1},
  130:         {xmppMessageReceived, 1}]).
  131: 
  132: one_direct_presence_sent(Config) ->
  133:     instrumented_story
  134:       (Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  135:        fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  136:                Presence = escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>),
  137:                escalus:send(Alice, Presence),
  138:                escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)
  139:         end,
  140:        [{xmppPresenceSent, 1 + user_alpha(2)},
  141:         {xmppPresenceReceived, 1 + user_alpha(2)},
  142:         {xmppStanzaSent, 1 + user_alpha(2)},
  143:         {xmppStanzaReceived, 1 + user_alpha(2)}]).
  144: 
  145: one_iq_sent(Config) ->
  146:     instrumented_story
  147:       (Config, [{alice, 1}],
  148:        fun(Alice) ->
  149:                RosterIq = escalus_stanza:roster_get(),
  150:                escalus_client:send(Alice, RosterIq),
  151:                escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)
  152:         end,
  153:        [{xmppIqSent, 1},
  154:         {xmppIqReceived, 1},
  155:         {modRosterGets, 1},
  156:         {xmppStanzaSent, 1 + user_alpha(1)},
  157:         {xmppStanzaReceived, 1 + user_alpha(1)}]).
  158: 
  159: one_message_error(Config) ->
  160:     instrumented_story
  161:       (Config, [{alice, 1}],
  162:        fun(Alice) ->
  163:                Chat = escalus_stanza:chat_to
  164:                         (<<"nobody@localhost">>, <<"Hi!">>),
  165:                escalus_client:send(Alice, Chat),
  166:                escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)
  167:         end,
  168:        [{xmppErrorTotal, 1},
  169:         {xmppErrorIq, 0},
  170:         {xmppErrorMessage, 1},
  171:         {xmppErrorPresence, 0}]).
  172: 
  173: one_iq_error(Config) ->
  174:     instrumented_story
  175:       (Config, [{alice, 1}],
  176:        fun(Alice) ->
  177:                BadIQ = escalus_stanza:iq_set(<<"BadNS">>, []),
  178:                escalus_client:send(Alice, BadIQ),
  179:                escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)
  180:         end,
  181:        [{xmppErrorTotal, 1},
  182:         {xmppErrorIq, 1},
  183:         {xmppErrorMessage, 0},
  184:         {xmppErrorPresence, 0}]).
  185: 
  186: one_presence_error(Config) ->
  187:     instrumented_story
  188:       (Config, [{alice, 1}],
  189:        fun(Alice) ->
  190:                BadPres = escalus_stanza:presence_direct
  191:                            (<<"localhost/no-such-resource">>, <<"subscribed">>, []),
  192:                escalus_client:send(Alice, BadPres),
  193:                escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)
  194:         end,
  195:        [{xmppErrorTotal, 1},
  196:         {xmppErrorIq, 0},
  197:         {xmppErrorMessage, 0},
  198:         {xmppErrorPresence, 1}]).
  199: 
  200: session_counters(Config) ->
  201:     escalus:story
  202:       (Config,
  203:        [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
  204:        fun(_Alice1, _Alice2, _Bob) ->
  205:                ?assert_equal(3, fetch_global_counter_value(totalSessionCount, Config)),
  206:                ?assert_equal(2, fetch_global_counter_value(uniqueSessionCount, Config)),
  207:                ?assert_equal(3, fetch_global_counter_value(nodeSessionCount, Config))
  208:        end).
  209: 
  210: node_uptime(Config) ->
  211:       X = fetch_global_incrementing_counter_value(nodeUpTime, Config),
  212:       timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  213:       Y = fetch_global_incrementing_counter_value(nodeUpTime, Config),
  214:       ?assert_equal_extra(true, Y > X,
  215:                           [{counter, nodeUpTime}, {first, X}, {second, Y}]).
  216: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  217: %% Helpers
  218: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  219: 
  220: user_alpha(NumberOfUsers) ->
  221:     %% This represents the overhead of logging in N users via escalus:story/3
  222:     %% For each user,
  223:     %%     xmppStanza(sent|received)
  224:     %%     and
  225:     %%     xmppPresence(sent|recieved)
  226:     %% will be bumped by +1 at login.
  227:     NumberOfUsers.
  228: 
  229: instrumented_story(Config, UsersSpecs, StoryFun, CounterSpecs) ->
  230:     Befores = fetch_all(Config, CounterSpecs),
  231:     StoryResult = escalus:story(Config, UsersSpecs, StoryFun),
  232:     Afters =  fetch_all(Config, CounterSpecs),
  233:     [ assert_counter_inc(Name, N, find(Name, Befores), find(Name, Afters))
  234:       || {Name, N} <- CounterSpecs ],
  235:     StoryResult.
  236: 
  237: fetch_all(Config, CounterSpecs) ->
  238:     [ {Counter, fetch_counter_value(Counter, Config)}
  239:       || {Counter, _} <- CounterSpecs ].
  240: 
  241: find(CounterName, CounterList) ->
  242:     case lists:keyfind(CounterName, 1, CounterList) of
  243:         false -> error(counter_defined_incorrectly);
  244:         {CounterName, Val} -> Val end.
  245: 
  246: fetch_counter_value(Counter, Config) ->
  247:     Params = [{host, ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain)},
  248:               {metric, atom_to_list(Counter)}],
  249:     {_, _, _, Vars, _} = katt_helper:run(metric, Config, Params),
  250:     HostValue = proplists:get_value("value_host", Vars),
  251:     HostValueList = proplists:get_value("value_host_list", Vars),
  252:     TotalValue = proplists:get_value("value_total", Vars),
  253:     TotalValueList = proplists:get_value("value_total_list", Vars),
  254:     [HostValue, HostValueList, TotalValue, TotalValueList].
  255: 
  256: %% @doc Fetch counter that is static
  257: fetch_global_counter_value(Counter, Config) ->
  258:     {Value, ValueList} = fetch_global_counter_value2(Counter, Config),
  259:     ?assert_equal_extra(Value, ValueList, [{counter, Counter}]),
  260:     Value.
  261: 
  262: %% @doc Fetch counter that can be incremented by server between two API requests
  263: %%
  264: %% Returns last actual value
  265: fetch_global_incrementing_counter_value(Counter, Config) ->
  266:     {Value, ValueList} = fetch_global_counter_value2(Counter, Config),
  267:     ?assert_equal_extra(true, Value =< ValueList, [{counter, Counter},
  268:                                                    {value, Value},
  269:                                                    {value_list, ValueList}]),
  270:     ValueList.
  271: 
  272: fetch_global_counter_value2(Counter, Config) ->
  273:     Params = [{metric, atom_to_list(Counter)}],
  274: 
  275:     {_, _, _, Vars, _} = katt_helper:run(global, Config, Params),
  276: 
  277:     Value = proplists:get_value("value", Vars),
  278:     ValueList = proplists:get_value("value_list", Vars),
  279:     {Value, ValueList}.
  280: 
  281: assert_counter_inc(Name, Inc, Counters1, Counters2) ->
  282:     ExpectedCounters = [Counter+Inc || Counter <- Counters1],
  283:     case ExpectedCounters == Counters2 of
  284:         false ->
  285:             ct:comment("Expected ~w, got: ~w", [ExpectedCounters, Counters2]),
  286:             error({unexpected_values, Name, get_diffs(ExpectedCounters, Counters2)});
  287:         true -> ok
  288:     end.
  289: 
  290: get_diffs(L1,L2) ->
  291:     lists:zip(L1, L2).
